name: Lemure Band
description: The Lemure Band is a collective of menacing lemures, embodying dark fiendish presence, notable for their ability to split into multiple entities.
memorable: Their ability to disperse into separate lemures when defeated makes them a continuous threat, challenging foes with high damage potential.
goals: Typically seeks to intimidate and disrupt enemies, leveraging their numbers and abilities to create chaos.
relations: Often associated with other devils or fiends and can work in groups for more impactful encounters.
environment: Commonly found in infernal realms or areas tainted by evil.
strengths: High damage potential, especially in numbers, and ability to create a sense of dread with their Eerie Groan.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to area-of-effect attacks and has low Dexterity, making it less nimble.
attacks: Melee attack using Fists, dealing substantial bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Band Dispersal allows it to split into separate lemures upon defeat, continuing to threaten enemies.
senses: Possesses darkvision that penetrates magical darkness.
skills: Has immunities to fire and poison, adding resilience against certain damage types.
additional_information: Immunities to being poisoned and cold damage resistance.
Can share its space with smaller creatures.
Eerie Groan can disrupt enemy focus from a distance.
test_queries: large fiend that splits into smaller devils
menacing monster with high damage potential
area attack vulnerability in fiend creature
